name: Chili
description: Dare to liven up your food with this spicy, mildly hot flavor-booster. Enhance seafood, chicken, roasted vegetables, or authentic Mexican cuisine with this bold creation.

name: Basil
description: Behold this wonderfully aromatic oil accented with the fragrance and taste of freshly picked sweet basil. An Italian masterpiece, perfect for drizzling on pasta or over a fresh plate of tomatoes and mozzarella.

name: Lemon
description: Enjoy a lemony zing coupled with a mild sweetness, all imparted by the humble Meyer lemon. Try making hummus with this and you’ll never buy store-bought again.

name: Bold
description: A striking olive oil with an intense pepperiness that balances well with its enticing fruitiness. Slather this on grilled or roasted meats or drizzle on soups, pastas, and tomato dishes for a truly memorable experience.

name: Delicate
description: When you need an olive oil that’s smooth and buttery, with zero bitterness, and an ever-so-light peppery flavor. An excellent substitute for butter, and ideal for baking and seafood.
